properties.Name: The Club Barbados Resort & Spa, Elite Island Resorts | Resort Marketing International

resortDetails.au: Please select a Check-In and Check-Out date to see available units at this resort.

checkInDetails.checkInDays: Weeks Resort check in days: Sunday , Monday , Tuesday , Wednesday , Thursday , Friday , Saturday
checkInDetails.checkInExtra: Please advise the resort if you anticipate a late arrival.

resortDetails.addOn: Pets are permitted at the resort
resortDetails.amenities4: Spa Services : Massage, Body treatments, Facials, Nail Services

roomDetails.intro: The resort features charming chalets and floating cottages. Most units are ideal for two people, although there are two units suitable for families of four. All units feature gracious, air conditioned interiors, and you may watch the sun rise or set on your private balcony overlooking the garden and the lake. You may even see fishermen taking out their nets early in the morning, or in the evening, dropping them for the next day's catch.
roomDetails.facilities:
Hotel Sleeps : 2
Privacy : 2
Kitchen : No
Bathroom : Full Furnishing
Televisin : Cable/Satelite
Kitchen Equipments : Coffee Maker, Refirgerator

resortDetails.au: Please select a Check-In and Check-Out date to see available units at this resort.

checkInDetails.checkInDays: Weeks Resort check in days: Sunday , Monday , Tuesday , Wednesday , Thursday , Friday , Saturday
checkInDetails.checkInExtra: Please advise the resort if you anticipate a late arrival.

resortDetails.addOn: Pets are not permitted at the resort
resortDetails.amenities4: Spa Services : Massage, Body treatments, Facials, Nail Services

roomDetails.intro: The resort features charming chalets and floating cottages. Most units are ideal for two people, although there are two units suitable for families of four. All units feature gracious, air conditioned interiors, and you may watch the sun rise or set on your private balcony overlooking the garden and the lake. You may even see fishermen taking out their nets early in the morning, or in the evening, dropping them for the next day's catch.
roomDetails.facilities:
Hotel Sleeps : 2
Privacy : 2
Kitchen : No
Bathroom : Full Furnishing
Televisin : Cable/Satelite
Kitchen Equipments : Coffee Maker, Refirgerator
